segments.text: I'm observing a kitchen scene, quite typical at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman is diligently drying a plate by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on the task at hand, which is admirable in its way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I see something else, something very unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing with water, constantly running from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pooling on the counter and streaming down the cabinets onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her foot is already submerged in the puddle, yet she shows absolutely no sign of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel the cold water spreading across the floor?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing that she remains so completely oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the water damage to the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster waiting to escalate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation makes me feel a strange sense of dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tranquil garden outside makes this internal turmoil even more pronounced.
segments.speaker: PAR
